Title: Relates to the safety requirements for the excavation of trenches in public works
Summary: Relates to the safety requirements for public works involving an estimated expenditure in excess of twenty-five thousand dollars for the excavation of any trench or trenches five feet or more in depth; provides a penalty of fifty thousand dollars for failure to comply.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to safety requirements for the excavation of trenches in public works
